attributes.action: Give more consideration to people who live and work in rural areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We who live and work in rural areas need help and assistance in travel matters it is quite normal for people to have to commute many miles to work public transport is not possible wages are often minimum allowed by law we need your help to combat ever increasing motoring costs its our only form of transport without it more of us will end on the dole or worse still migrate to allready overpopulated polluted cities we want to work help us to do this, only you and your government can.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
